Uses of Package
com.xhive.util.interfaces

Packages that use com.xhive.util.interfaces
com.xhive.core.interfaces This package contains the X-Hive core interfaces, that give access to database (meta-)information, database users and authorities, and control the connection to the database (including transaction control). 
com.xhive.util.interfaces This package contains a selection of tools for importing data from relational data sources, processing XML documents with XSLT and XSL:FO. 
 

Classes in com.xhive.util.interfaces used by com.xhive.core.interfaces
XhiveCSVFileLoaderIf
          Loads data from a character separated file.
XhiveFormatterIf
          Formats an XSL-FO document into other formats.
XhiveFtsUtilIf
          Provider of convenience full text search processing methods.
XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf
          Load SQL data from a JDBC source into a document.
XhiveSqlLoaderIf
          Deprecated. Use XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf or XhiveCSVFileLoaderIf instead
XhiveTransformerIf
          Applies an XSLT transformation to a document.
 

Classes in com.xhive.util.interfaces used by com.xhive.util.interfaces
XhiveExternalDataLoaderIf
          Parent interface of XhiveCSVFileLoaderIf and XhiveSQLDataLoaderIf.
XhiveFtsTextHandlerIf
          Event handler for events fired by the getTextAndTerms method in the XhiveFtsUtil class.
